name: WindowsMachineFileDelete
description: Deletes a file on a remote windows computer.
author: WFM IRMA/ICON Team

inputs.name: machineList
inputs.label: Machines
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Provide a comma separated list of the machine(s) IP addresses or FQDNs.
For example, dbserver.fabrikam.com, dbserver_int.fabrikam.com, 192.168.12.34

inputs.name: AdminUserName
inputs.label: Admin Login
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the administrator's login of the target machine.

inputs.name: AdminPassword
inputs.label: Password
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Provide the administrator's password of the target machine.
The best practice is to create a variable in the Build or Release definition, and mark it as 'Secret' to secure it, and then use it here, like '$(adminPassword)'.

inputs.name: fileToDelete
inputs.label: Delete Location
inputs.helpMarkDown: File or Folder to be deleted on the server
